summary: Diff adds a one-page React/Tailwind frontend with sticky header navigation and a services list, plus styling/theme tokens. However, it does not show the required generated image assets being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`, and one service label capitalization differs from the spec. It also introduces Internet Identity/auth + React Query actor plumbing that was not requested for this static one-page site.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated image assets as static files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (logo and hero illustration) and render them in the page.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend references `/assets/generated/wp-capital-logo.dim_512x512.png`, but the diff does not include any added files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (no images shown in added files list), so the required assets are not evidenced as present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Services must include all provided offerings with correct spelling/capitalization, including "Hosting solutions".
missing_requirements.reason: The services array uses the title "Hosting Solutions" (capital S) rather than the required "Hosting solutions" exactly.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider and hooks (and related actor setup) added even though authentication is not required and third-party authentication is a non-goal for this one-page site.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says third-party authentication is a non-goal and Internet Identity is not required; the diff adds an InternetIdentityProvider, AuthClient logic, and actor hooks.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client setup and query invalidation/refetch logic added for a static one-page website with no data fetching requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The diff introduces `@tanstack/react-query` QueryClientProvider and actor query logic, while also stating the site has no backend methods/data fetching needs.
